requirementText.name: Previous Submission agreement
requirementText.description: An optional reference to a previous submission agreement(s) which the information may have belonged to. @TYPE is used with the value "PREVIOUSSUBMISSIONAGREEMENT". Example: FM 12-2387/12726, 2007-09-19 Example: http://submissionagreement.kb.se/dnr331-1144-2011/20120711/ Note: It is recommended to use a machine-readable format for a better description of a submission agreement. For example, the submission agreement developed by Docuteam GmbH http://www.loc.gov/standards/mets/profiles/00000041.xml See also: Alternative record ID's, https://earksip.dilcis.eu/#VocabularyaltrecordIDTYPE.

testCase.description: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSSUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] MAY exist. If mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSSUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] exists then it MUST have a text node with a reference to a previous submission agreement associated with the package.

error.message: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSSUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] does not exist. MAY be: mets/metsHdr/altRecordID[@TYPE='PREVIOUSSUBMISSIONAGREEMENT'] exists and its text is a reference to a previous submission agreement associated with the package.
